projects.title: Talk Up
projects.description: Experience seamless communication with Talk Up. Engage in real-time messaging, create or join group chats, and personalize your profile. With end-to-end encryption and responsive design, connect effortlessly from any device. Join us for the future of online chatting!

projects.title: Bloom Basket
projects.description: Our goal is to craft a seamless and delightful online shopping journey. We aim to develop a platform that's user-friendly, scalable, secure, and speedy. It's all about ensuring shopping online is effortless and enjoyable for everyone!

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: The aim of the project is to mention all about me, my project details & work experience.

projects.title: Cart'S Kord
projects.description: Aim of the project to design a web app with the help of redux and use it to create a real time cart for adding, deleting and updating products in cart.

projects.title: XCryptoify
projects.description: App was created for the guidance of crypto exchange, used api's of coins and exchanges from CoinGecko. Exchange cards redirected to respective currency page and coin cards was designed with the help of api data in INR, USD & EUR to shown the coin's details.

projects.title: Video Appist
projects.description: The aim of the project to design a dual theme video web app. Which have a LogIn SignUp page which can redirect to each other, Upload Video page to upload videos, and videos and free videos page which shows all the videos.

projects.title: The Tech Star
projects.description: This a project to learn react, design forms in react, develop sliders with library like react-responsive-carousel.

projects.title: Ecommerce'S Zone
projects.description: Developed the backend of the E-commerce Web App. Where the user can see listed products and can filter them, also he/she can login after registering himself & can add products to the cart. Then a user can place an order & can cancel too if product is cancellable.

projects.title: Shorten-URL
projects.description: In this project the aim was to developed the backend for generating a short URL of a long URL. Used Redis cache services for decreasing latency and making it more user-friendly

projects.title: Realistic Book's
projects.description: Developed the backend of Library-Management, where the author can perform various operations for managing his books. He can create book documents after registration and logIn, also he can see all the enlisted books through Get api & can apply filter. Reviws are public api's for books.

projects.title: Vibrant Interns
projects.description: The project's aim was to developed a web application that provides internship to students of different registered colleges.

projects.title: Sparkly Blog's
projects.description: Aim of the project is to develop backend of Blogging Site, where the blogger can manage his blogs. He can create blog after registration and logIn, also he can see all the his blogs through Get api & can update or delete them.
